description: Create a project transport plan event location prediction.
permissions: Admin users can create predictions. Non-admin users must be members of the effective broker (broker on the project transport plan event, or explicit broker context when no event is provided).
side_effects: Creates a prediction record and triggers server-side generation of predictions, which may call an external prediction service.
validation_notes: --transport-order is required. You must provide either --project-transport-plan-event or all explicit context flags (--project-transport-event-type-id-explicit, --event-position-explicit, --broker-id-explicit). Predictions are read-only and generated server-side; create can fail if the prediction service is unavailable, if explicit references do not exist, if explicit values do not match the associated event/plan, or if the transport order does not belong to the effective broker or conflicts with the plan existing transport order.
